replies.body: You are missing lulu and ivern.
there's going to be a shitload of yasuo players moving to normal blind pick just to play him because he's always banned in draft. loads of mirror match ups too
I can reassure you that Lee is permaban with 10 bans. At least any game I am in.
FUCKING can't wait, this will feel so good

Im not seeing some of these bans.....

Ahri will probably be banned a bit, but she isnt gonna be perma. She isnt so good that she is a pick ban (Kassadin S3)

Shaco is NOT a perma ban champ. He is annoying but definately not worthy of perma ban.

Darius...... no

Yasuo. No one likes playing against yas so yea.... probably.

Fizz.. What are you smoking? 

Lee Sin. Dude.... lee isnt perma ban. 

Syndra. Depends on what people are planning on playing but I could see a lot more bans coming out

Im more predicting Permenant Assassin bans because of the current player base's hatred of getting bursted. Im thinking that we will see a lot of {{champion:55}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:157}} bans with a dabbling of Strong mage bans like {{champion:103}} {{champion:134}} 

The last 5 bans will probably be preferential bans like {{champion:164}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:427}} {{champion:90}} 

And whatever is currently OP will be banned. {{champion:497}} {{champion:498}} (I personally dont think Xaya will be broken but ey. its a new champ)
Well i never see camille or ivern. 10 bans mean you can ban the ones you listed as well as mine.

Im making a list based on what I see banned and what seems like is going to be banned based on the community response lately. Camille is a ban that i see in probably 40% of my games. And Ivern has been raising a lot of eyebrows recently. I'm expecting his ban rate to rise by a large margin fairly soon. Shaco and Malz just push some players buttons and they ban them (That's why they are in the preferential bans section) 

People are constantly complaining about getting one shot and so i suggested 3 champs that I see a lot of players hating who one shot you as well as 2 mages that are fairly strong in the current meta. 

You made a semi troll post including Yasuo 4 times. I made a reasonable breakdown post that includes my own personal anecdotal evidence to try and give a possible ban scenario for silver play.
I mean, It's still gonna work the same as Pro banns. 6 champs banned, 6 champs picked, then 4 banned, 4 picked, So a lot of those champs will still make it through.
